name: The Boss of Equations
description:
The Boss of Equations is a simple educational game for VimJam 2: Boss [8 Bits to Infinity]. The objective is to solve as many equations as you can and become the boss of equations. If the user solves all the available exercises, the backend of the game produces additional ones. Hence, the user can never reach an end; however, s/he may earn enough points to become the boss of the equations.

Plans involve creating more complex equations, including additional arithmetic operators and difficulty levels tailored to the user's knowledge level calculated by intelligent techniques.

Please let me know of any problems or bugs you encounter during installing or playing the game.
